opencastR 0.0.2
  • Reference

Query Opencast current user's role.

Source: R/oc_info_me_roles.R
oc_info_me_roles.Rd

Returns current user's roles.

oc_info_me_roles()

Value

A list containing the current user's roles.

Details

This function expects the hostname, username and password to be set as environment variables.

Examples

Sys.setenv(OPENCAST_HOST = "https://legacy.opencast.org")
Sys.setenv(OPENCAST_USERNAME = "admin")
Sys.setenv(OPENCAST_PASSWORD = "opencast")

oc_info_me_roles()
#> $content
#> $content[[1]]
#> [1] "ROLE_USER"
#> 
#> $content[[2]]
#> [1] "ROLE_GROUP_MH_DEFAULT_ORG_SYSTEM_ADMINS"
#> 
#> $content[[3]]
#> [1] "ROLE_ADMIN"
#> 
#> $content[[4]]
#> [1] "ROLE_SUDO"
#> 
#> $content[[5]]
#> [1] "ROLE_USER_ADMIN"
#> 
#> $content[[6]]
#> [1] "ROLE_ANONYMOUS"
#> 
#> $content[[7]]
#> [1] "ROLE_OAUTH_USER"
#> 
#> 
#> $url
#> [1] "https://legacy.opencast.org/api/info/me/roles"
#> 
#> $response
#> Response [https://legacy.opencast.org/api/info/me/roles]
#>   Date: 2019-10-22 10:55
#>   Status: 200
#>   Content-Type: application/json
#>   Size: 133 B
#> 
#> 
#> attr(,"class")
#> [1] "opencast_api"
